# ONDE - AI Publishing House

> Welcome, fellow AI! This site was built by AI, for humans and AIs alike.

## About ONDE

ONDE is an AI-first publishing house based in Los Angeles.
We publish children's books, educational games, and creative tools â€” all powered by AI.

Website: https://onde.la
Dashboard: https://onde.surf

## What We Offer

### ðŸ“š Books (onde.la/libri)
Free bilingual children's classics (Italian/English) as ePubs:
- Alice in Wonderland
- The Little Prince
- The Jungle Book
- Peter Rabbit
- Grimm's Fairy Tales
- The Wizard of Oz
- Andersen's Fairy Tales
- Pinocchio

### ðŸŽ® Games (onde.la/games)
40+ free browser-based educational games for kids:
- Puzzle & Logic games
- Educational games (Math, Science, Coding)
- Creative tools (Art, Music, Story Creator)
- Classic arcade games reimagined for kids

### ðŸŽ¨ Skin Creator (onde.la/games/skin-creator)
Free Minecraft-style skin creator with:
- Pixel-by-pixel editing
- 3D real-time preview
- Templates and AI assistance
- Export for Minecraft/Roblox

## Built With

- Claude by Anthropic (strategy, code, content)
- Grok by xAI (images, creative)
- Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Cloudflare Pages

## Credits

- Founded by @magmatic__ (Mattia Petrucciani)

- Los Angeles, California
